"**Lonely Day** " is the second [single](/wiki/Single_\(music\) "Single
\(music\)") from the 2005 album _[Hypnotize](/wiki/Hypnotize_\(album\)
"Hypnotize \(album\)")_ by [Armenian American](/wiki/Armenian_American
"Armenian American") [metal](/wiki/Heavy_metal_music "Heavy metal music") band
[System of a Down](/wiki/System_of_a_Down "System of a Down"). It was written
by guitarist [Daron Malakian](/wiki/Daron_Malakian "Daron Malakian"), who also
provides lead vocals on the track. The song received a nomination for Best
Hard Rock Performance at the 49th Annual Grammy Awards.[1]

The song is featured in the 2007 film _[Disturbia](/wiki/Disturbia_\(film\)
"Disturbia \(film\)")_ , as well as the film's trailer; however, it is not
included in the film's soundtrack. Daron did not write the song as a tribute
to his brother as rumored, as Daron is an only child.[2]
